title: The Left’s Plan Is Reset, NOT Anarchy | Guest: Christopher Rufo | 9/24/20
description:
Protesters took to the streets after no cops were charged for the death of Breonna Taylor. Glenn and Stu give the real story of that tragic night. Will the Left turn on Antifa? Glenn reviews last night’s show: We’re now seeing an orchestrated “bottom-up” movement toward color revolution and the Great Reset. The Left must make Trump look like a semi-autocratic leader, and MSNBC’s Morning Joe couldn’t stop comparing Trump to Hitler. Jason Buttrill explains the Senate’s latest findings on Hunter Biden and how he received money from the wife of the mayor of Moscow. Trump refused to confirm he’d step down after the election if he loses. Writer Christopher Rufo talks the latest efforts by Seattle to defund the police.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
